Cliff.Action: Friends celebrate his success and loyalty, referring to him as MVP and remembering his roots.
Bridesmaid #1 mentions he practiced a proposal on her while seeing another woman, implying insincerity in relationships.
Successfully makes a big studio sale and has a big wedding, earning praise from friends as MVP of the year.
Practices proposing to ensure it goes well, showing preparation and thoughtfulness.
Takes off his glasses and looks around after bride pushes cake into groom's face, showing awareness of social situation.
Does not respond verbally or take visible action when called out by crowd for looking like a 'white bowling ball'.
Implied by father to be capable of writing a 120-page story, suggesting skill and intelligence.
Has not yet written a simple one-page movement order requested by his father, indicating possible lack of follow-through or organizational skill.
Endures an old sibling ritual of being put in a headlock by his brother Tommy, showing tolerance and patience despite annoyance.
Responds to Tommy's aggressive teasing with sarcastic but familiar banter, indicating a friendly and sincere sibling relationship.
Responds to Tommy's aggressive headlock with sarcastic but controlled remarks, showing emotional control and confidence.
Does not physically retaliate or escalate the situation despite provocation, indicating restraint and social skill.
Engages in a sibling ritual that he wishes would end, showing some passivity in changing recurring negative dynamics.
Tapes well-wishers with his own Handycam, capturing moments for others.
Shares a personal story about his scar with Cydney, showing openness.
Engages in playful, teasing banter with Cydney about his brother.
Takes initiative to record well-wishers with his own Handycam, showing preparedness and engagement.
Confidently answers Cydney's questions with a mix of humor and detail, demonstrating social ease and intelligence.
Mentions experience as a deputy air marshal, implying capability and responsibility in a high-stakes role.
Engages in light banter about family details, showing quick thinking and conversational skill.
Pays cash for the tour and politely declines the extra video offer, showing straightforwardness and sincerity.
Makes a lighthearted joke about the tour name, indicating a friendly and good-natured attitude.
Pays cash confidently for a helicopter tour and declines the offered video service, opting to use his own camera instead.
Makes a witty comment about the tour name, showing awareness and a sense of humor.
Observes the news about a dangerous situation in Hawaii but does not show visible panic or rash behavior.
Encourages Cydney to take a picture of him, shares excitement about the scenery.
Expresses enthusiasm about hiking the Kalalau trail, engages positively with the pilot.
Hangs out the side of a doorless helicopter to get footage, showing confidence and enthusiasm for capturing the experience.
Encourages Cydney to take a picture of him, demonstrating social ease and awareness.
Expresses desire to hike the Kalalau trail after seeing it from the air, showing initiative and adventurous spirit.
Engages cooperatively with the Supply Guy, listens to advice about permits and trail conditions.
Scowls at the map and expresses skepticism about the food (cut-rate Spam).
Responds to Cydney's affectionate teasing with some distance (scowling, focusing on map), but does not reject her.
Consults with the supply guy about trail permits and supplies, shows awareness of permits and trail length.
Dismisses the supply guy's advice about needing more days and supplies, insists three days is plenty despite warnings about elevation changes and trail difficulty.
Keeps permits organized inside a color brochure and shows them when asked.
Frowns at cheap food options and questions their quality, showing some discernment.
Appears distracted or scowling at the map while his wife flirts with him, possibly indicating lack of full focus on planning.
Teases Cydney playfully when she says she missed him.
Produces a wad of cash to pay, acknowledging it looks like he robbed a bank but explaining it as their wedding haul.
Thanks Earth Momma sincerely after getting help.
Produces a wad of cash confidently to pay, showing preparedness and control over finances.
Teases Cydney lightly, indicating social ease and confidence.
Interacts smoothly with locals and completes the transaction efficiently.
Does not react visibly to the disturbing newspaper headline found under the tire, possibly indicating composure or detachment.
Joins in singing cheerfully with Cydney, showing enjoyment and connection.
Stops to pick up hitchhikers despite Cydney's hesitation, showing openness and friendliness.
Makes a lighthearted comment about Hawaii being safe, attempting to reassure and maintain a positive atmosphere.
Decides to pick up hitchhikers despite obvious warning signs and Cydney's discomfort.
Attempts to rationalize risky behavior with casual optimism about Hawaii being safe.
Engages in lighthearted singing and camaraderie with Cydney, showing social ease and confidence.
Spots tattoo on Kale and comments with a hint of dark humor ('DO NOT REVIVE'), tries to downplay the distance they will travel, indirectly suggesting caution or avoidance.
Recognizes the significance of the tattoo on Kale’s chest and uses it to assess the situation, indicating awareness and situational understanding.
Attempts to deflect or downplay the distance they will travel, possibly to calm others, showing some social tact and control.
Fails to provide a clear or confident answer about how far they will go, which causes some tension and uncertainty among others.
Offers to drive Cydney to the wedding location, showing helpfulness and consideration.

Responds calmly to Kale’s antagonism and leaves without escalating conflict.

Decides to drive Kale and Cleo to their destination, showing willingness to take responsibility and be helpful.

Smiles and poses warmly with Cydney for a photo, engaging in lighthearted banter with the camera samaritan.
Shares a positive, appreciative comment about the scenery, calling it 'The perfect getaway.'
Questions the safety of the trail despite others doing it, showing caution rather than reckless behavior.
Jokes about needing to read the camera manual, showing awareness of his limits with technology.
Successfully hikes a difficult trail with Cydney, navigating slippery and dangerous terrain cautiously by checking the drop-off.
Questions whether others really completed the dangerous trail section, indicating critical thinking and caution.

Takes possession of the shaken Cydney after her near fall, showing concern.
Asks Cydney her name after the incident, indicating interest and care.

Successfully crosses a difficult trail section without calamity, despite not being as slick as Nick.

Does not prevent Cydney from nearly slipping, but quickly takes possession of her after the incident.
Engages in casual conversation, showing social ease but no particular display of skill or intelligence.
Responds modestly about his screenplay work, corrects Nick politely on terminology.
Becomes suddenly on guard when Nick asks if he is in the business.

Is a sought-after screenplay writer with a script in pre-production and studios interested in his work.
Appears uncertain or evasive when asked about casting and recent rewrites on his script.

Seems guarded and possibly uncomfortable when questioned about the rewrite and timeline, indicating possible lack of control or transparency.
Tries to change the subject when conversation becomes uncomfortable.
Attempts to deflect conversation away from himself when confronted about his career frustrations, showing some social awareness but avoiding direct engagement.
Engages with others to gather information about the murders, asking relevant questions about location and details.
Engages in light banter with Nick and interacts with Cydney and others confidently, showing social ease.
Asks Cydney for input about location, showing awareness and seeking confirmation.
Does not intervene when the K.C. girls express fear and decide to leave, possibly indicating a lack of assertiveness in a tense situation.
Considers the new trail and suggests making the beach by sunset, showing practical concern and a desire to keep the group moving together.
Suggests letting Nick have his privacy when Cydney asks about the falls, showing respect for others' boundaries.
Sweats and struggles on the trail but continues, showing perseverance though no direct warmth is expressed here.
Considers the new trail carefully, noting it is steep, slippery, and laced with tree roots, showing awareness of the environment.
Suggests making it to the beach by sunset, indicating goal orientation and confidence.
Observes two trekkers far behind and tries to identify them, showing alertness and situational awareness.
Struggles physically with the steep trail and weight on his back, sweating heavily and showing signs of difficulty.
Stops for water and checks the trail behind, demonstrating caution and vigilance.
Turns back to check on group, showing attentiveness.

Takes out cell phone to check for reception before joining others, showing consideration.
Turns back to check surroundings, ensuring safety before proceeding.
Attempts to get cell phone reception to check for communication.
Makes a light, somewhat awkward comment about nudity, showing social awareness but slight discomfort.
Uses his phone to research the Honolulu murders, showing concern and a desire to protect others by gathering information.

Successfully accesses online information about recent murders, selects the most promising lead, and reads details aloud to others.
Responds calmly to Kale's provocations without escalating conflict.
Pockets the cellphone and does not immediately engage in confrontation.
Questions Kale about following them, showing suspicion but not hostility.
Notices a reflection in the water and pauses before downloading a photo, showing alertness and situational awareness.
Pockets the cellphone and head-rag calmly when confronted by Kale, maintaining composure.
Engages in conversation with Kale, asking if he is being followed, indicating cautiousness and awareness of potential threats.
Appears somewhat confused or uncertain when Kale accuses him of deception, saying 'I'm not sure what --', showing a slight lapse in confidence or clarity.
Apologizes to Kale and tries to explain the situation calmly after a confrontation.
Attempts to leave when Kale blocks his way, avoiding further conflict.
Tries to de-escalate tension with Kale by apologizing and explaining the situation calmly.
Attempts to leave when blocked by Kale, showing awareness of conflict avoidance.
Provides accurate information about the trail and permits needed, demonstrating knowledge and preparedness.
Responds vaguely with 'Just playin’ it by ear' when asked about plans, indicating some uncertainty or lack of firm planning.
Reassures Cydney by focusing on keeping track of time and permits, showing responsibility and care for group safety.
Searches through Kale’s rucksack for permits, indicating a willingness to help and be thorough for the group’s benefit.
Does not immediately reject Gina and Nick joining the group, allowing them to tag along, showing tolerance and friendliness.
Momentarily distracted or uncertain about the permits, showing some disorganization but no negative intent.
Keeps track of time and reminds the group to be mindful of it.
Attempts to locate permits but cannot find them, showing some disorganization.
Searches through another person's rucksack to find clues, demonstrating resourcefulness and observational skills.
Uncertain about whether he had the permits and appears confused about their location.

Checks the trail behind to ensure safety for the group.

Checks the trail behind to ensure it is clear before proceeding.
Attempts to use his phone but finds no reception.
Engages confidently in conversation about his profession and responds wittily.
Engages in casual, friendly banter with Nick, showing interest in his stories and details.
Does not dominate the conversation, allows others to share their experiences.
Orients the conversation by connecting det-cord detail to practical use, showing understanding of tactical tools.
Asks clarifying questions about comic book references, showing curiosity but limited direct knowledge.
Admits he wasn’t present during the events Nick describes, indicating honesty and self-awareness about his limits.
Pays close attention to Nick's detailed story and acknowledges the good details, showing attentiveness and ability to absorb information.
Stops looking over his shoulder and focuses on Nick, indicating situational awareness and ability to shift focus appropriately.

Checks on Nick and Gina to ensure they are safe crossing the spillway.

Pressures Cydney about the identity of the killers, showing suspicion and distrust.
Uses a subtle excuse to create distance from others, showing strategic thinking.
Accesses and interprets a low-quality photo on his phone to identify potential killers, demonstrating resourcefulness and situational awareness.

Skeptical about stories, questions their truthfulness.
Waves at Nick from afar, acknowledging him.
Questions the credibility of stories and tries to analyze the situation critically.
Engages in conversation to gather information about others.
Appears fixated on a photo on his cell phone, showing focus and attention to detail.
Unzips to buy more time, indicating a tactical pause.
Does not immediately accept others' stories at face value, showing skepticism.

Exits his tent to check on the situation, engages with others about what they are seeing, tries to understand the tension.
Responds casually to Nick's comment about goats, showing a relaxed attitude in a tense moment.

Questions Cydney about what everyone is looking at, indicating engagement and a desire to understand the situation.

No indication of panic or confusion; remains calm and observant in a potentially tense moment.

Expresses concern about Cydney's safety.

Involved in a cold-blooded murder with predatory demeanor, showing capability but morally negative behavior.

Attempts to communicate affection and sincerity to Cydney, but struggles with emotional expression and connection.
